problem.markdown:
1. For an over damped system (x) c greater than 1 ( ) c less than 1 ( ) c equal to 1 ( ) None of these
2. The magnification factor is the ratio of maximum amplitude and static deflection (x) true ( ) false
3. What is the natural frequency in rad/s of a system whose damped natural frequency is 30rad/s and damping ratio is 0.6 ?
(x) 37.5 ( ) 30 ( ) 45 ( ) 50
4. A rod 20 mm diameters and 1.2 m long is fixed at both ends and has a mass of 2kg concentrated at the middle. Ignoring the weight of the rod, calculate the frequency of transverse vibrations. Take E=200 Gpa ?
(x) 47.04Hz ( ) 23.52Hz ( ) 5.88Hz ( ) 11.76Hz
5. The amplitude of a damped system will not change with time.
( ) true (x) false
problem.p: 2. The magnification factor is the ratio of maximum amplitude and static deflection
3. What is the natural frequency in rad/s of a system whose damped natural frequency is 30rad/s and damping ratio is 0.6 ?

4. A rod 20 mm diameters and 1.2 m long is fixed at both ends and has a mass of 2kg concentrated at the middle. Ignoring the weight of the rod, calculate the frequency of transverse vibrations. Take E=200 Gpa ?
5. The amplitude of a damped system will not change with time.
